question: As per the recent statistics released by MoHUA, which state tops in the disbursal of loans under PM SVANidhi scheme?
explanation:
As per the recent data released by the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry, almost one-fourth of the loan amount was disbursed in Uttar Pradesh at Rs 354.26 crore.
It is followed by Madhya Pradesh and Telangana. This information is collected till January 2021. Out of the 18.38 lakh applications, 13.82 lakh received loans amounting to Rs 1,363.88 crore.
